slides.title: Why Classifieds Work

content.headline: Local Classifieds Reach Buyers Ready to Act
content.stat: Classifieds get 40% response rate vs. 2% for social posts

slides.narration: Why do local classifieds work so well? Local audience—people actually in your area. High intent—they're actively looking for what you're offering, not just scrolling. Free to post—no listing fees. And syndicated—your classified appears across our entire network. Classifieds get a forty percent response rate compared to two percent for typical social posts.

slides.title: Classified Categories
slides.narration: What are you posting? Now Hiring—find local talent. For Sale—equipment, inventory, supplies. Commercial Space—if you have office, retail, or warehouse available. Services Offered—B2B services you provide. Or Announcements—general business updates. Select your category when you post.

slides.title: Post Your Classified

content.headline: Ready to Reach Local Buyers?
content.reassurance: Free • Goes live immediately • Edit or remove anytime

slides.narration: Ready to reach local buyers? Click 'Post This Classified' and it goes live immediately. Want to make changes first? Click 'Edit First' to customize. It's free, it goes live immediately, and you can edit or remove it anytime. Your local audience is waiting.
